children.text: The Smart Connect app is a tool intended to control comfort functions of a hearing aid by a patient within a frame as given by a hearing health specialist, e.g., ENT doctor, audiologist or acoustician.
It fully supports Smart Connect and its audio streaming capabilities. If Smart Connect is not present, access to the most basic features is available by acoustic operation.
Please carefully read the manual of the hearing aids before using this app.
Smart Connect app enables you to personalize the hearing aids with the following functions if configured by your hearing care professional and supported by the used hearing aids:
Smart Connect app is compatible with any Android device running Android 4.0.3 or higher.

If Smart Connect is not connected to your mobile device this app generates short control signals which may be audible. While using the app do not hold the loudspeaker of this device to your ears or the ears of others. Do not use the device with headphones, headsets or other audio playback devices.
